title: Cell 1
brief_description: This video aims to give insight into the structure of cells, showing mutual as well as divergent characteristics of bacterial (procaryotic) and human (eukaryotic) cells. The structure and function of DNA, RNA and proteins are explained. Basic cellular proceses, the structure of the macromolecules, and the three-dimensional conformations are shown in computer generated models. Sutiable for Secondary level students.
